reviews.review: Amazing movie really ties in all the characters together waiting ten years for this really payed off.
Love the ending. Different not more of the same! About a major movie has an ending like this..

this is one of the best marvel movies. very breathtaking action scenes, very emotional moments, and high stakes. and thanos is one of the most best villain ever when it comes to power and character development.

Glad to see the marvel franchise is still alive and kicking. After the disaster that was Star Wars The Last Jedi, this cements Marvel as Disney's Top Franchise, and top quality as far as movies are concerned. Darker then the typical marvel movie, but that is a nice change

Avengers Infinity War is not just a movie, it's a piece of art that took 10 years to draw. A movie like no other movies, an experience like no other. And to those who already watched it please do not ruin it for others. #ThanosDemandsYourSilence 
Thank you @marvel 
Cannot wait for Avengers 4...

Not as great as everyone thinks it is. I enjoyed it, but nothing is explained properly. Let's use Dragonball as an example, they have power scaling and this helps explain why opponent A, can't leave a scratch on opponent B, because there is a massive difference in power levels. In the MCU (movies) they haven't clearly defined who is stronger than who, so when Thanos comes along and just trounces everyone, I still don't know why he's so strong, because he's an alien? If he didn't have the glove, would he still be formidable?? I know these are all explained in the comics, but they can't assume all moviegoers know that stuff.
It was an okay movie and I'm looking forward to the next part, but let's hope it's got more substance and not just action packed muscled/robot/CGI dudes fighting.
Pet Peeve - there is a part where a certain hero can see the future and all possible outcomes... Yet can't see into the literal immediate future, when a hero does something stupid, which could have prevented this whole "war".
Lots to like about the movie. Unfortunately, those are overshadowed by a horrible ending.

Avengers Infinity War is an outstanding movie!  Lots of humor, action and drama make a great story.  Ten years of Marvel Movies come down to this!  A stunning ending (no spoilers I promise!) that will have you talking about it.  I highly recommend it!  I give it a 4.5 out of 5 star rating.

Avengers Infinity War made me feel three emotions.

Anger
Frustration
Sadness

It is one of the few films who have caused some feeling in me and all I can say is that sometimes the result is greater than the sum of it's parts
